Text: Ver Forwarded by Nelson FerriesCorpEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject Ver Mark Schrab We received a call today from Petroquest demanding we increase our nominations to stay in balance I have been forwarding you noms daily but PQ says you are not changing your nom with ANR We SEC and Cheyenne are mmbtu behind on a month to date basis Please increase our nomination immediately and stay on top of it As I sent you earlier today current volumes are over mmbtuday which generates mmbtuday for our share on a current basis The addition of over days adds day for a total nom of mmbtuday SECCheyenne subject to daily change of production

Reallocated Natural Gas Production on ANR as a result of Grand Chenier force majeure Cc Devon Energys natural gas production reallocated by ANR PL for October approx MMBtu will be sold for flow on October at Enron North Americas weighted average price for ANR Pipeline Louisiana gas If you have any questions please call me at

GISB and MMS Special ProvisionsForwarded by Nelson FerriesCorpEnron on PM Jeffrey T CT AM To Dan J CT cc Nelson NRON Subject GISB and MMS Special Provisions Dan Could you handle Jeff Forwarded by Jeffrey T HodgeHOUECT on AM Nelson NRON PM To Jeffrey T CT cc Subject GISB and MMS Special Provisions Jeff The MMS sent the attachments over for us to review They indicated that there is no contract executed between the MMS and ENA Please review the attached GISB and provide me with any comments Thanks Forwarded by Nelson FerriesCorpEnron on PM Cobb Lawrence on PM To Nelson at Enron cc Subject GISB and MMS Special Provisions Thanks for attending to this Nelson Call me if you have any questions Larry Cobb Manager RIK Mid Office GISBUpdatedoc MMSGISBSpecialProvdoc GISBUpdatedoc MMSGISBSpecialProvdoc

RE Keep Whole LanguageGerald I have reviewed the draft language you sent me The language looks good Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday October AM To Ferries Nelson Thorne Judy Cc Hodge Jeffrey T Wallumrod Ellen Hesse Lisa Perlingiere Debra Subject Keep Whole Language Attached is a draft of the Keep Whole language we discussed last week Please review and provide any comments you may have File KeepWholedoc

FW Gas Purchase Contract DraftGerald Please take a look at the attached contract from a potential producer Let me know what you think or any comments you have Original Message From Singer John Sent Wednesday October AM To Ferries Nelson Subject Gas Purchase Contract Draft Well what do you know Please Review Forwarded by John M SingerCorpEnron on AM Hawley RayeAnn on PM To JohnM nroncom JohnM nroncom cc Subject Gas Purchase Contract Draft John Attached is a copy of McMoRans contract for your review Please give me a call if you have any questions I apologize for the delay in getting this to you RAYE ANN Gas Purchase Terms and Conditions Contract DOC Gas Purchase Terms and Conditions Contract DOC Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap

RE Keep Whole Language for MarinerNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Thank you for the language and the short turn around you provided This is a great help Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Friday September PM To Thorne Judy Grass John Ferries Nelson Cc Wallumrod Ellen Subject Keep Whole Language for Mariner Attached is the revised Keep Whole Language I assume this language would completely replace the Variance langauge that we currently insert in our GTCs and any Replacement Price Differential Language in our Pooling Point and Wellhead GTCs Ie this will be the only measure of damages for these deals If this is not correct lets discuss Ellen This language would be the same language use for the WT Offshore and Spinaker deals Is this correct Nelson Please review before sending out to make sure I have correctly captured your business deal File KeepWholedoc
Devon Purchase ProposalNonPrivilegedpst Gerald The gas ENA IM Upstream Co LLC is purchasing is located WC Estimated volume MMBtud
